attributes.action: Stop the British media and the way they portray Islam and Muslims
attributes.additional_details: Today in this world and the United Kingdom, people are brain washed by the media making them believe that Islam is a threat and that all Muslims are 'Terrorists.' We need to stop the British media from brian washing people to believe that Muslims are bad people. This is not the way of life, to discriminate people because of their religion.

rejection.details: There are already laws governing race hatred/libel, etc.
